DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This combination contains the chemotherapy drugs cyclophosphamide, vincristine sulfate (Oncovin), and dacarbazine and the steroid hormone prednisone. Combinations usually work better than single drugs because different drugs kill cancer cells in different ways.

Section.Para: Each of the drugs in this combination is approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to treat cancer or conditions related to cancer.

Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Hodgkin lymphoma in children. It is used to treat certain male patients and is often used with radiation therapy.

Section.Para: This combination may also be used with other drugs or treatments or to treat other types of cancer.
